trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Zalto deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Zalto wears a {@item ring of lightning resistance}.

trait.name: Tackle
entries: When Zalto enters any enemy's space for the first time on a turn, the enemy must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 6d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.
